value:
Seliph has turned out so well. I am
grateful to Prince Lewyn for all the
guidance he gave my son.

I knew that, as a maiden of the Spirit
Forest, I should not have contact with
outsiders. I knew it would bring ruin...

Please care for the ones you hold
dear. Those bonds are what keep
the world from falling apart.

I was told that I would be despised by
the outside world. Lord Sigurd's love
made me forget that...for a time.

However long or short my time in this
place may be...from the bottom of my
heart, I thank you for it.

Please, take good care of yourself.
Please...live a peaceful, happy life.
All life is a cycle. Even this is destiny.
Can you hear the voice of the spirits?
Julius... Julia, I...

You will see my gratitude expressed
in my performance. Thank you.

I've lived two lives. Both were tragic.
But each had irreplaceable blessings.
Each made me happy.

Seliph, Julia...and Julius. Each of my
children was forced to endure such
hardship due to my cowardice.$k$pI was raised with the warning that any
contact I had with the world outside
my forest would lead to ruin.$k$pI chose to ignore that warning to be
with Lord Sigurd. I wanted to stay
with him forever.$k$pEven in another life, even across vast
swaths of time...even knowing the
consequences, I would do so again.$k$pBut I cannot ignore that my choices
have caused my children to suffer.$k$pPerhaps, someday, the gates of light
will open, and we can be free of the
yoke of destiny. I dream of that day...
To protect those I hold dear!
Light... Please...
I still have hope...
I will not allow it.
Please forgive me...
My name has been passed down in legends...? Are you certain?
Oh! Do you ever grow tired of startling others?
What really happened does not always find its way into the historiesâ€¦
I once lost my memories...and became a puppet to the whims of fate.
I promise to honor the faith you have in me, no matter what.
To simply live with the one you love... Why is even that so difficult?
I am glad to have met you. That is something I can hold onto.
Very well.
What do you think?
We will be together...
